meanings.definition: A person who has messy hair upon waking up in the morning.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the bedheads in the house struggle to tame their unruly hair.
meanings.sent2: She always looks like a bedheads when she first wakes up.
meanings.sent3: The bedheads at the sleepover joked about their wild morning hair.
meanings.sent4: The wind made her hair look like a bunch of bedheads dancing in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's bedheads made her look like a sleepy lion.

meanings.definition: The top part of a bed frame that serves as a headboard.
meanings.sent1: The bedheads of the bed frame were intricately carved with floral patterns.
meanings.sent2: She leaned against the bedheads while reading a book in bed.
meanings.sent3: The cat loved to scratch the bedheads of the bed frame.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight cast a shadow of the bedheads on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The bedheads matched the rest of the bedroom furniture perfectly.

meanings.definition: A condition where the head of a bed is damaged or broken.
meanings.sent1: The bedheads of the old bed were cracked and chipped.
meanings.sent2: They had to replace the bedheads after it got damaged in the move.
meanings.sent3: The movers accidentally broke the bedheads while carrying the bed upstairs.
meanings.sent4: The bedheads looked sad and forlorn with their broken edges.
meanings.sent5: The bedheads creaked and groaned under the weight of the mattress.
